input_text:
Job Title: Head of Engineering

Location: San Francisco Bay Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Head of Engineering | Building All-In-One Artificial Superintelligence Doctor | $250k - $400k | Equity | Hybrid |
Are you a brilliant Technical Leader who'd be interested in the continued creation of the world's first & revolutionary All-In-One artificial superintelligence Doctor? 
This is an exclusive chance to join a team from companies like Google, OpenAI, and seasoned repeat founders who have built startups that have scaled from $0 to the multi-millions. 
AIM: Saving Lives x Road to becoming a trillion-dollar company x World's best Artifical Superintelligence Doctor.
Nothing is more impactful than saving lives - so this incredibly talented team, which includes some of the brightest minds in AI has created an all-in-one AI Medical Assistant designed to improve the quality of healthcare for millions around the world, forever! 
You will be a hands-on leader who enjoys coding every day - overseeing the development and maintenance of an all-in-one AI-medical assistant & AI platform that brings the rapid creation, testing, and deployment of machine learning models. 
The current stack includes; React.js/Next.js/Node.js/Express/Python. Cloud GCP on Kubernetes, terraform, NoSQL db, foundational and finetuned LLMs.
We are very open-minded about salary/package & want to speak to the world's best. 
Requirements;
Bachelor’s, Master’s, or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related area. Holding a Ph.D. is considered an advantage. 
At least five years of experience in designing and implementing comprehensive full-stack solutions across multiple platforms, leading to the creation of intuitive products used by over 100,000 customers. 
Demonstrated leadership experience, ideally in a product-driven technology company, with a focus on cultivating a growth mindset. 
Experience as a Technical Co-founder in a startup or senior leader in a MAANG company is highly desirable. 
Capable of excelling as an individual contributor and has a robust history of building, leading, and nurturing high-performing teams without sacrificing talent quality. 
Specialist in cutting-edge AI technologies, including generative AI, as well as machine learning models, data analytics, and the foundational infrastructure and engineering required to scale these models reliably. 
Proficient in Machine Learning and the development of dependable systems with high availability for AI/ML. 
Skilled in conveying complex data insights in an understandable and actionable manner to non-technical stakeholders. 
Highly driven, proactive, and cooperative, with strong interpersonal skills capable of persuading and impacting decisions.
Venchr is a Trading Name of TGIG Ltd. This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended exclusively for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify the system administrator. If you are not the intended recipient you are advised that disclosing, copying, distributing or taking any action in reliance on the contents of this information is strictly prohibited. WARNING: Although the company has taken reasonable precautions to ensure no viruses are present in this email, the company cannot accept responsibility for any loss or damage arising from the use of this email or attachments. TGIG Ltd, 6 The Runnells, PE19 6AN

Experience Level (if available): Director

Creating the rapid creation, testing, and deployment of machine learning models.
Leading the development of intuitive products used by over 100,000 customers.
Cultivating a growth mindset within the team.
Building, leading, and nurturing high-performing teams.
Conveying complex data insights to non-technical stakeholders.
